sit.lua.description: Players can type /sit in the chat to sit.

shift To Sprint.lua.description: Simple shift to sprint script (DON'T add this to StarterCharacterScripts)

instant Kill.lua.description: Insert this script in a part for an instant kill (useful for obbies)

leaderstats DataStore.lua.description: Saves all stats in leaderstats to DataStore when player leaves and loads on join

landmine.lua.description: Explodes part when touched and removes it

pet Script.lua.description: Pet object that follows the player (Make sure to edit the "petObject" variable and add this to ServerScriptService)
